meanings.definition: A wooden platform built above the ground
meanings.sent1: The kids played on the decks at the park.
meanings.sent2: The workers were busy building new decks for the houses.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ran across the deck, looking for nuts.

meanings.sent5: The sun warmed the deck, making it a perfect spot to relax.

meanings.sent1: Grandma shuffled the decks before starting the game.

meanings.definition: To knock someone to the ground with a punch
meanings.sent1: He decks his opponent with a powerful punch.
meanings.sent2: She decks the bully who was bothering her little brother.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that he could deck anyone with his humor.
meanings.sent4: The boxer decked his rival in the final round.
meanings.sent5: The superhero decked the villain with one swift move.
